posts.post_title: SOLD - *Reduced*Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 2.5 Piedmont 350 $2100
posts.post_content:
Having trouble getting images to attach to my post, but email me for pics. Price of $2100 is net to me. [url]lancemoore9@gmail.com[/url]

Card has top corner creases but the overall color and Cobb image look great.

[quote name="MooreCubs" post=1870760]Having trouble getting images to attach to my post, but email me for pics. Price of $2100 is net to me. [url]lancemoore9@gmail.com[/url]

Card has top corner creases but the overall color and Cobb image look great.[/QUOTE]

Your picture is most likely too large. if you can reduce it it will probably work. Phone pictures and ipad pictures are usually way too big.
